alert.note: Alert for Leon; Limestone (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 1:33PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A couple of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Robertson, southwestern Leon and southeastern Limestone Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 132 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking several strong storms in southern Limestone county, northeastern Robertson and western Leon counties, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Boggy State Park, Twin Oak Reservoir, Lake Limestone, Hilltop Lakes, Normangee, Thornton, Marquez, Leona, Seale, Robbins, Bald Prairie, Oletha, Flynn and Ridge. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 152 and 159. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
